channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: YOLOv7: Trainable bag-of-freebies sets new state-of-the-art for real-time object detectors
item.description: YOLOv7 surpasses all known object detectors in both speed and accuracy in the range from 5 FPS to 160 FPS and has the highest accuracy 56. 8% AP among all known real-time object detectors with 30 FPS or higher on GPU V100.

item.title: Bridging the Gap between Object and Image-level Representations for Open-Vocabulary Detection
item.description: Two popular forms of weak-supervision used in open-vocabulary detection (OVD) include pretrained CLIP model and image-level supervision.

item.title: DCT-Net: Domain-Calibrated Translation for Portrait Stylization
item.description: This paper introduces DCT-Net, a novel image translation architecture for few-shot portrait stylization.

item.title: Speech Denoising in the Waveform Domain with Self-Attention
item.description: In this work, we present CleanUNet, a causal speech denoising model on the raw waveform.

item.title: Pen and Paper Exercises in Machine Learning
item.description: This is a collection of (mostly) pen-and-paper exercises in machine learning.

item.title: Instant Neural Graphics Primitives with a Multiresolution Hash Encoding
item.description: Neural graphics primitives, parameterized by fully connected neural networks, can be costly to train and evaluate.

item.title: Efficient Spatial-Temporal Information Fusion for LiDAR-Based 3D Moving Object Segmentation
item.description: We also use a point refinement module via 3D sparse convolution to fuse the information from both LiDAR range image and point cloud representations and reduce the artifacts on the borders of the objects.

item.title: CodeRL: Mastering Code Generation through Pretrained Models and Deep Reinforcement Learning
item.description: To address the limitations, we propose "CodeRL", a new framework for program synthesis tasks through pretrained LMs and deep reinforcement learning (RL).

item.title: MLGO: a Machine Learning Guided Compiler Optimizations Framework
item.description: Leveraging machine-learning (ML) techniques for compiler optimizations has been widely studied and explored in academia.

item.title: AvatarCap: Animatable Avatar Conditioned Monocular Human Volumetric Capture
item.description: Then given a monocular RGB video of this subject, our method integrates information from both the image observation and the avatar prior, and accordingly recon-structs high-fidelity 3D textured models with dynamic details regardless of the visibility.

item.title: FlashAttention: Fast and Memory-Efficient Exact Attention with IO-Awareness
item.description: We also extend FlashAttention to block-sparse attention, yielding an approximate attention algorithm that is faster than any existing approximate attention method.

item.title: Global Context Vision Transformers
item.description: We propose global context vision transformer (GC ViT), a novel architecture that enhances parameter and compute utilization.

item.title: No Language Left Behind: Scaling Human-Centered Machine Translation
item.description: Driven by the goal of eradicating language barriers on a global scale, machine translation has solidified itself as a key focus of artificial intelligence research today.

item.title: DailyTalk: Spoken Dialogue Dataset for Conversational Text-to-Speech
item.description: We sampled, modified, and recorded 2, 541 dialogues from the open-domain dialogue dataset DailyDialog which are adequately long to represent context of each dialogue.

item.title: Towards a General Purpose CNN for Long Range Dependencies in $N$D
item.description: The use of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) is widespread in Deep Learning due to a range of desirable model properties which result in an efficient and effective machine learning framework.

item.title: fairseq
item.description: Facebook AI Research Sequence-to-Sequence Toolkit written in Python.

item.title: Demystifying MMD GANs
item.description: We investigate the training and performance of generative adversarial networks using the Maximum Mean Discrepancy (MMD) as critic, termed MMD GANs.

item.title: Ivy: Templated Deep Learning for Inter-Framework Portability
item.description: We introduce Ivy, a templated Deep Learning (DL) framework which abstracts existing DL frameworks.

item.title: BoT-SORT: Robust Associations Multi-Pedestrian Tracking
item.description: The goal of multi-object tracking (MOT) is detecting and tracking all the objects in a scene, while keeping a unique identifier for each object.

item.title: Accelerating Sparse DNN Models without Hardware-Support via Tile-Wise Sparsity
item.description: Network pruning can reduce the high computation cost of deep neural network (DNN) models.
